thread.title: Oscars 2017: Matt Damon walks red carpet
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Matt Damon walks red carpet

title: Oscars 2017: Matt Damon walks red carpet
text: Share The brunette beauty added matching silver sandal heels and shiny clutch. Happily wed: The couple, who have been married for 12 years and share four children, couldn't hide their love as they posed for photos with their arms around each other Silver goddess: Luciana looked sensational in a quicksilver satin gown with a very revealing bodice and a skirt that fell in folds to the floor with a small train pooling around her feet Revealing: Luciana's gown featured a plunging neckline and a cut-out bodice with this straps and she added matching drop earrings Chiseled: Matt, 46, was ruggedly handsome in a three-piece navy tuxedo with white dress shirt and black bow tie The Martian star joked with Michael Strahan on the official ABC red carpet show that he was ready to get a roasting during the telecast from host Jimmy Kimmel. The two have been locked in a highly-publicized feud for the past 11 years as Kimmel tries to prevent Damon from appearing on his late night talk show while Damon seeks ways to sabotage Jimmy Kimmel Live! And a short time before the Academy Awards kicked off, Kimmel shared a photo form his dressing room showing him watching Damon being interviewed on the red carpet. Kimmel captioned the snap posted to Instagram: 'Dead man walking the red carpet. #Oscars.' Plotting revenge: Jimmy Kimmel kept his well-publicized feud with Damon going, tweeting this photo from his dressing room at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood ahead of the Oscars telecast 89TH ACADEMY AWARDS NOMINEES MOTION PICTURE OF THE YEAR Arrival
